name: Air Fryer Shortbread Cookie Fries
author: Allrecipes
summary: Cut cookie dough into shortbread 'fries' for a fun air fryer sweet treat served with strawberry-chipotle 'ketchup' and lemon curd 'mustard.'
ingredients: ⅛ teaspoon ground dried chipotle pepper  (Optional)
directions: Combine flour and sugar in a medium bowl
Cut in butter with a pastry blender until mixture resembles fine crumbs and starts to cling
Form the mixture into a ball and knead until smooth
Preheat an air fryer to 350 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Roll dough to 1/4-inch thickness on a lightly floured surface
Arrange fries in a single layer in the air fryer basket
Cook until lightly browned, 3 to 4 minutes
Let cool in the basket until firm enough to transfer to a wire rack to cool completely
To make strawberry "ketchup," press jam through a fine mesh sieve using the back of a spoon
Whip the lemon curd to make it a dippable consistency for the "mustard
" Serve sugar cookie fries with the strawberry ketchup and lemon curd mustard
